title: Philippine Poverty Area Estimates Web App Choropleth Visualization
description: Web application providing a visual representation using a choropleth map of the estimated magnitude of poor families in the Philippines from the years 2006, 2009, 2012, and 2015.

title: Declutter
description: Web application that provides a platform for users to write and share their thoughts in a clutter-free space.

title: SPARTA Capstone: Data Science and Machine Learning using Python
description: A machine learning peer graded capstone of Smarter Philippines through Data Analytics R&D, Training and Adoption (SPARTA).

title: SPARTA: Representing Data and Feature Engineering
description: A machine learning peer graded assignment of project SPARTA. Implementation of feature engineering on adult income data set.

title: SPARTA: Supervised ML Binary Classification
description: A machine learning peer graded assignment of project SPARTA. Implementation of machine learning classification on breast cancer wisconsin diagnostic data set.

title: SPARTA: Unsupervised ML Clustering
description: A machine learning peer graded assignment of project SPARTA. Implementation of machine learning clustering on iris plants data set.

title: Data Visualization: Prime Number Forest
description: An interactive data visualization made with python, plotly, pandas, and numpy, of how prime numbers from 1 - 200 would look like if it was a forest.

title: Expression Converter
description: A course requirement in data structures and algorithm: java application made with java swing designed to provide a user-friendly interface for converting expressions between infix, prefix, and postfix notations.

title: Anagram
description: A midterm course requirement for CS Professional Elective 1: web-based anagram game made using HTML, CSS, and vanilla JS.
